title: Excellent !!
positiveReview: Everything. From design to how comfortable it was. The host very kind and responds immediately. Also the appart is located 10 min from the city center old town !
negativeReview: That the heat was automated by the host. The appart in general was warm but the last day we went to sleep very early as our flight was very very early in the morning and the heat was not turned on. We felt a little bit cold.
fullReview: Excellent !! Everything. From design to how comfortable it was. The host very kind and responds immediately. Also the appart is located 10 min from the city center old town ! That the heat was automated by the host. The appart in general was warm but the last day we went to sleep very early as our flight was very very early in the morning and the heat was not turned on. We felt a little bit cold.

title: Great apartment
positiveReview: A lovely, homely and spacious apartment with everything you could need for a short stay in Bucarest. The location is great. Close to the old town but in a quiet street. The host was excellent and contactable if needed.
fullReview: Great apartment. A lovely, homely and spacious apartment with everything you could need for a short stay in Bucarest. The location is great. Close to the old town but in a quiet street. The host was excellent and contactable if needed.

title: A nicely decorated and cozy apartment
positiveReview: The apartment is clean and well-kept, well-equipped kitchen, good location. Quality projector, smart lighting. A bedroom with a single bed and a small double bed and another bedroom with a large and spacious double bed. Very comfortable mattresses. There is also a spacious living room with a sofa and a dining area.
negativeReview: Second floor stairs only, not suitable for people with disabilities or those with a lot of luggage. We didn't mind.
fullReview: A nicely decorated and cozy apartment. The apartment is clean and well-kept, well-equipped kitchen, good location. Quality projector, smart lighting. A bedroom with a single bed and a small double bed and another bedroom with a large and spacious double bed. Very comfortable mattresses. There is also a spacious living room with a sofa and a dining area. Second floor stairs only, not suitable for people with disabilities or those with a lot of luggage. We didn't mind.

positiveReview: Close to the old town.
fullReview: Close to the old town.

title: Really cosy flat, close to the old town, really good value for money
positiveReview: Great amenities and very clean
negativeReview: Only thing is 2nd floor and no lift so not good for people with mobility issues but we were fine walking up
fullReview: Really cosy flat, close to the old town, really good value for money. Great amenities and very clean. Only thing is 2nd floor and no lift so not good for people with mobility issues but we were fine walking up.

positiveReview: Excellent location, Very comfortable facilities. Good communication with the owner.
fullReview: Excellent location, Very comfortable facilities. Good communication with the owner.

positiveReview: Everything perfect: cleanliness, location, interior spaces and courtesy of the host. Very comfortable beds. The home theater was amazing.
negativeReview: Perhaps the bathroom is a little smaller than the apartment. But still functional.
fullReview: Everything perfect: cleanliness, location, interior spaces and courtesy of the host. Very comfortable beds. The home theater was amazing. Perhaps the bathroom is a little smaller than the apartment. But still functional.

title: Estancia cómoda y agradable
positiveReview: Ubicación y el apartamento en general bonito y cómodo
fullReview: Estancia cómoda y agradable. Ubicación y el apartamento en general bonito y cómodo.

title: מקום שהייה מצוין!
positiveReview: דירה יפהפייה ומאוד נקייה
negativeReview: לא היה נייר טואלט ומגבות ספייר
fullReview: מקום שהייה מצוין! דירה יפהפייה ומאוד נקייה. לא היה נייר טואלט ומגבות ספייר.

title: Would highly recommend for small groups of friends.
positiveReview: Great property just a short walk to the old town.
fullReview: Would highly recommend for small groups of friends. Great property just a short walk to the old town.

title: Séjour de rêve dans une ville incroyable
positiveReview: situation exceptionnel, qualité des infrastructures et décoration de l'appartement :-) la communication avec Bogdan est exellente. logement idéal pour visiter Bucarest
fullReview: Séjour de rêve dans une ville incroyable. situation exceptionnel, qualité des infrastructures et décoration de l'appartement :-) la communication avec Bogdan est exellente. logement idéal pour visiter Bucarest.

positiveReview: Exceeded our expectations! A large and spacious apartment, decorated in a modern style and kept very clean. Comfortable beds, excellent air conditioning, and quiet with no noise from either neighbours or the road. Also has a full set of amenities - coffee machine, washing machine, kettle, dishwasher, clean quality towels, the great projector & home theatre setup, etc. Communication with the host was clear and friendly, and self check-in was very straightforward. Location is also excellent, only a 5-10 minute walk to get into Old Town. Though the local neighbourhood also has some great independent restaurants and cafes.
fullReview: Exceeded our expectations! A large and spacious apartment, decorated in a modern style and kept very clean. Comfortable beds, excellent air conditioning, and quiet with no noise from either neighbours or the road. Also has a full set of amenities - coffee machine, washing machine, kettle, dishwasher, clean quality towels, the great projector & home theatre setup, etc. Communication with the host was clear and friendly, and self check-in was very straightforward. Location is also excellent, only a 5-10 minute walk to get into Old Town. Though the local neighbourhood also has some great independent restaurants and cafes.

positiveReview: הדירה מעוצבת יפה, חדרים מרווחים מאוד ומיטות נוחות מאוד. מכונת כביסה ומייבש. המיקום מעולה ושקט. בעל הדירה אפשר לנו להשאיר את המזוודות בדירה עד הערב.
negativeReview: המיטה הזוגית השניה קצת קטנה סטנדרטית 1.4 מ' פחות נוח לשני מבוגרים
fullReview: הדירה מעוצבת יפה, חדרים מרווחים מאוד ומיטות נוחות מאוד. מכונת כביסה ומייבש. המיקום מעולה ושקט. בעל הדירה אפשר לנו להשאיר את המזוודות בדירה עד הערב. המיטה הזוגית השניה קצת קטנה סטנדרטית 1.4 מ' פחות נוח לשני מבוגרים.

positiveReview: אהבנו הכל ! דירה מהממת שרואים שהבעלים חשבו וחושבים על הכל. מזגנים מצויינים מקרן איכותי לסרטים ספה בסלון מפנקת מקלחת ושירותים מאובזרים וניקיים מטבח מאובזר, גדול ונוח שכולל מדיח, מיקרו, תנור, כריים, מקרר גדול, מכונת פולי קפה ועוד. טרסה אינטימית וכיפית שולחן בפינת אוכל מעץ שפשוט נוח לשבת משפחה שלמה. הדירה ברחוב צדדי שקט אבל תוך 3 דק אתם בלב העיר העתיקה... מיקום מושלם !! מיטות נוחות וחדרים מרווחים מאוד מאוד. צמוד לדירה יש חנייה חינם אבל לא הרבה או חנייה בתשלום ב30 ליי ליום עפנו על הדירה, פשוט ממליצים בחום.
fullReview: אהבנו הכל ! דירה מהממת שרואים שהבעלים חשבו וחושבים על הכל. מזגנים מצויינים מקרן איכותי לסרטים ספה בסלון מפנקת מקלחת ושירותים מאובזרים וניקיים מטבח מאובזר, גדול ונוח שכולל מדיח, מיקרו, תנור, כריים, מקרר גדול, מכונת פולי קפה ועוד. טרסה אינטימית וכיפית שולחן בפינת אוכל מעץ שפשוט נוח לשבת משפחה שלמה. הדירה ברחוב צדדי שקט אבל תוך 3 דק אתם בלב העיר העתיקה... מיקום מושלם !! מיטות נוחות וחדרים מרווחים מאוד מאוד. צמוד לדירה יש חנייה חינם אבל לא הרבה או חנייה בתשלום ב30 ליי ליום עפנו על הדירה, פשוט ממליצים בחום.

positiveReview: A comfortable apartment on a quiet street, yet very close to the Old Town, the metro, and trams. The host was very helpful and spoke excellent English. I highly recommend it.
fullReview: A comfortable apartment on a quiet street, yet very close to the Old Town, the metro, and trams. The host was very helpful and spoke excellent English. I highly recommend it.

title: Excelent pentru un city break.
positiveReview: Apartamentul curat si ingrijit. Ne-a placut aparatul de cafea plin cu boabe numai gata de facut cafeluta de dimineata. Vecini amabili. Paturile confortabile. Un apartament spatios. Avea gel de dus la baie si alte cosmetice utile. E aproape de centru pentru o plimbare prin Old Town.
negativeReview: In afara cladiri sunt gandaci. E o prima impresie cand ajungi acolo mai neplacuta cand ii vezi cat sunt de mari. Fiind parchet de lemn vechi, cam scartaie. Dar acestea sunt detalii minore. Nu va impiedicati in ele. Pret-calitate este bun.
fullReview: Excelent pentru un city break. Apartamentul curat si ingrijit. Ne-a placut aparatul de cafea plin cu boabe numai gata de facut cafeluta de dimineata. Vecini amabili. Paturile confortabile. Un apartament spatios. Avea gel de dus la baie si alte cosmetice utile. E aproape de centru pentru o plimbare prin Old Town. In afara cladiri sunt gandaci. E o prima impresie cand ajungi acolo mai neplacuta cand ii vezi cat sunt de mari. Fiind parchet de lemn vechi, cam scartaie. Dar acestea sunt detalii minore. Nu va impiedicati in ele. Pret-calitate este bun.

title: Good value, comfortable bed, clean room
positiveReview: Close to historical city and Lipscani street. Easy access, clear instructions, spacious room, well designed
fullReview: Good value, comfortable bed, clean room. Close to historical city and Lipscani street. Easy access, clear instructions, spacious room, well designed. 2nd floor with no elevator.

title: Mükemmel dizayn edilmiş fakat asansörü olmayan bir ev
positiveReview: Ev güzel bir konumda. Temizlik idare eder banyo lavabosu pek temiz değildi. Evin içi mükemmel dizayn edilmiş. Fotoğraflardan daha güzel görünüyordu.
negativeReview: En büyük problem asansör yok. Bebeğiniz ve bebek arabanız varsa bu büyük bir problem. İki kat boyunca merdivenlerden araba taşımanız gerekiyor. Ve çıkarken ilginç bir şekilde ev sahibi çöpleri atmamızı istedi ? daha önce böyle bir taleple karşılaşmamıştım
fullReview: Mükemmel dizayn edilmiş fakat asansörü olmayan bir ev. Ev güzel bir konumda. Temizlik idare eder banyo lavabosu pek temiz değildi. Evin içi mükemmel dizayn edilmiş. Fotoğraflardan daha güzel görünüyordu. En büyük problem asansör yok. Bebeğiniz ve bebek arabanız varsa bu büyük bir problem. İki kat boyunca merdivenlerden araba taşımanız gerekiyor.

positiveReview: We had a great stay at this apartment! It was spotlessly clean, the host was polite and helpful, and the location was absolutely fantastic—couldn't ask for more!
fullReview: We had a great stay at this apartment! It was spotlessly clean, the host was polite and helpful, and the location was absolutely fantastic—couldn't ask for more!

title: De volgende keer dat ik naar Boekarest ga, verblijf ik hier weer.
positiveReview: Locatie en verzorging van het appartement zijn perfect. Communicatie met de host is ook heel fijn. Ruim verblijf, fijne kamers, fijne temperatuur. Het was prettig thuiskomen na elke avond uit te gaan.
fullReview: De volgende keer dat ik naar Boekarest ga, verblijf ik hier weer. Locatie en verzorging van het appartement zijn perfect. Communicatie met de host is ook heel fijn. Ruim verblijf, fijne kamers, fijne temperatuur. Het was prettig thuiskomen na elke avond uit te gaan.

title: Old towna çok yakın
positiveReview: Meydana çok yakın, etrafta kahve ve kahvaltı alabilecek dükkanlar var. Ses sistemini çocuklar çok beğendi.
fullReview: Old towna çok yakın. Meydana çok yakın, etrafta kahve ve kahvaltı alabilecek dükkanlar var. Ses sistemini çocuklar çok beğendi.
